ygData.subject: Re: staff of observers
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You should be going for the staff of the wheel. I already got that and the acumen mask and the runescale cloak. I m now trying to get the temperate flux
ygData.messageBody:
Lim Dul wrote:
>
> From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
>
> Where did everyone go? hehe. Is there another Wizard list more active than
> this one? :)
>
> Anyway, taking my time trying to solve quests lately so my power-leveling
> brethren are passing me by (again...on their second characters hehe) . Got
> the Staff of Observers yesterday which is pretty cool. How do we get the
> Sentinel spell to work on the staff...we just right-click on the staff
> before medding? To bad I really don't have a need for this staff right
> now...Staff of Writhing and Stein of Mogguk is better for me. But I wanna
> play around with it before I use it for trade or something. :)
>
> --Lim'Dul
>

You should be going for the staff of the wheel. I already got that and
the acumen mask and the runescale cloak. I'm now trying to get the
temperate flux staff, but it's not easy since Sol A and Permafrost are
completely horrible dungeons (ever wonder why they are virtually
empty?).

--
Sergey

Worker bees can leave
Even drones can fly away
The queen is their slave
